lines.text:
[climbing into the back of Ed Harley's pickup]
That old woman scares the piss out of me!
God damn you! God damn you!
He already has, son. He already has.
Can't you stop this? Can't you call it off?
...but I'm gonna send it back to whatever the Hell it come from!
I'm afraid raising the dead ain't within my power.

[talking about Joel and Chris looking for Steve]
They should be okay, right? I mean, they took the guns and everything.
God is the only thing that can stop what's out there, Kim.

[walks over to the drawer and pulls out a large kitchen knife]
Just in case God doesn't show.
When we get out of here, Joel's going to be carrying his balls home in a knapsack.
Remind me never to piss you off, Tracy.
